description: Candidates outline their views on how the States can assist Guernsey's recovery from the crisis.
title: Guernsey Election 2020: Covid pandemic recovery
title_page: Guernsey Election 2020: Covid pandemic recovery - BBC News
maintext: "By managing the pandemic, which is far from over, as we have to date that allows the vast majority of the economy to function, and by skilled negotiation of the external challenges to our island such as Brexit."
